comments.body: Are there any major modern browsers that don't support it at this point?  If so, it'd be a better UX to hide the "copy" button upon page load when `supportsCopying()` returns `false`.
Yeah, I guess I should just not bother with this.  I thought about not showing the copy button, but then I'd need to run JS on load, and I didn't want to add that. I'll just remove this.
